com.emman.tame.dialogs.BLNPreference.android:title: Button Light Notifications
com.emman.tame.dialogs.BLNPreference.android:summary: Pulse button lights when screen is off, and a notification is received.

com.emman.tame.dialogs.EBLNPreference.android:title: Enhanced Button Light Notifications
com.emman.tame.dialogs.EBLNPreference.android:summary: Pulse button lights when a notification is received.

com.emman.tame.dialogs.S2WPreference.android:summary: Sweep finger across button pad to wake device.
